verses.esv:
8   Keep me as the apple of your eye;
    hide me in the shadow of your wings,
verses.kjv: 8 Keep me as the apple of the eye, hide me under the shadow of thy wings,
verses.niv: 8 Keep me as the apple of your eye; hide me in the shadow of your wings

verses.esv:
5   Who is that coming up from the wilderness,
    leaning on her beloved?
  Under the apple tree I awakened you.
  There your mother was in labor with you;
    there she who bore you was in labor.
verses.kjv: 5 Who is this that cometh up from the wilderness, leaning upon her beloved? I raised thee up under the apple tree: there thy mother brought thee forth: there she brought thee forth that bare thee.
verses.niv: 5 Who is this coming up from the desert leaning on her lover? Under the apple tree I roused you; there your mother conceived you, there she who was in labor gave you birth.
